channel.title: Converting bay into bitcoin or currency
channel.description:
Hi Guys,
I understand using the bitbay software to trade. However are we able to trade bay into USD or bitcoin? Im assuming eventually there is a way to convert some BAY to cash or BTC if needed?

item.title: Converting bay into bitcoin or currency
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

Yes the Client has a decentralized marketplace. And we are busy working to update the web wallet which will allow us to turn the “web marketplace” back online.
https://beta.bitbay.market/

The Client’s marketplace is currently not very active at the moment.

Until then, the best option to trade fast will be to use LATOKEN exchange.
As we build up awareness with the power of the dynamic peg protocol, we hope that our decentralized marketplaces will come alive with activity especially for OTC deals.

I hope this answers your question

Read full topic
item.source: Converting bay into bitcoin or currency
